import React, {useState} from 'react' export default function DataEntryFunc() { const [data, setData] = useState({ email: '', name: '', address1: '', address2: '', city: '', province:'', postalCode: '', showEmail: false, showName: false, showAddress1: false, showAddress2: false, showCity: false, showProvince:false, showPostalCode: false, }) const readData = (event) => { setData({...data,[event.target.name]: event.target.value}) } const submitData = (event) => { event.preventDefault() data.setShowEmail(true) data.setShowName(true) data.setShowAddress1(true) data.setShowAddress2(true) data.setShowCity(true) data.setShowProvince(true) data.setShowPostalCode(true) } return (

Data Entry Form

) }
